author: Retro Game Corps
description:
Retroid just launched their new generations of handhelds: the Retroid Pocket G2 and the Retroid Pocket 6.  Here is a roundup of everything we know so far, plus some ideas of what we can expect.

More info:
Affiliate link: https://tinyurl.com/Retroid-RGC
Non-affiliate: https://www.goretroid.com/

** Quick correction: I said the KONKR Pocket Fit is 60Hz but it's actually 144Hz (all these handhelds sort of blend into one another!)

00:59 Retroid Pocket G2

16:43 summary and conclusion

title: Some Thoughts on the New Retroid Handhelds
